name: Dash Daring
description:
Control Dash Daring (or not) and collect gems while escaping the rising lava!

Along the way you'll encounter the Dice of Doom, a cursed artifact that will block your progress until you summon it's mighty  power. 

- Press Shift to jump

- Press Shift in the air to double jump (Unless you're being swarmed by bees!)

- Press Shift while wall sliding to perform a wall kick

- Collect Gems to increase your score

- Lava rises quicker after each roll of the Dice of Doom
